description.value:
Whenever you use your second wind, choose one ally within 10 squares of you. That ally gains a benefit determined by the season you chose for your Acolyte of the Natural Cycle class feature.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.zyWcv4iukTS1638w]{Blessing of the Wastes}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.0HdeUWmzaoSqsB5k]{Nature's Bounty: Spring}
